name: .B83
summary: Learn about .B83 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To install the updates a B83 file contains on your TI-83 Premium CE calculator, you must:
Connect your calculator to your computer (and make sure it appears in TI Connect CE).
Drag your B83 file to TI Connect CE's Calculator Explorer.
TI Connect CE will then begin updating your calculator's OS and applications. Your calculator may reboot during the update process.
